title: outputs
description: The description of the outputs that result of simulating a Magnetic

coreLosses.description: Data describing the output core losses

windingLosses.description: Data describing the output winding losses

windingWindowMagneticStrengthField.description: Data describing the output magnetic strength field

leakageInductance.description: Data describing the output magnetic strength field

magnetizingInductance.description: Data describing the output magnetic strength field

coreLosses.description: Data describing the core losses and the intermediate inputs used to calculate them
coreLosses.title: coreLossesOutput

origin.description: Origin of the value of the result

methodUsed.description: Model used to calculate the core losses in the case of simulation, or method used to measure it

magneticFluxDensity.description: Excitation of the B field that produced the core losses
magneticFluxDensity.title: excitation

temperature.description: temperature in the core that produced the core losses

volumetricLosses.description: Volumetric value of the core losses

eddyCurrentCoreLosses.description: Part of the core losses due to eddy currents

hysteresisCoreLosses.description: Part of the core losses due to hysteresis

windingLosses.description: Data describing the winding losses and the intermediate inputs used to calculate them
windingLosses.title: windingLossesOutput

origin.description: Origin of the value of the result

methodUsed.description: Model used to calculate the winding losses in the case of simulation, or method used to measure it

currentPerWinding.description: Excitation of the current per winding that produced the winding losses
currentPerWinding.title: excitation

temperature.description: temperature in the winding that produced the winding losses

leakageInductance.description: Data describing the leakage inductance and the intermediate inputs used to calculate them
leakageInductance.title: leakageInductanceOutput

origin.description: Origin of the value of the result

methodUsed.description: Model used to calculate the leakage inductance in the case of simulation, or method used to measure it

magnetizingInductance.description: Data describing the magnetizing inductance and the intermediate inputs used to calculate them
magnetizingInductance.title: magnetizingInductanceOutput

origin.description: Origin of the value of the result

methodUsed.description: Model used to calculate the magnetizing inductance in the case of simulation, or method used to measure it

fieldPoint.description: Data describing the magnetizing inductance and the intermediate inputs used to calculate them
fieldPoint.title: fieldPoint

point.description: The coordinates of the point of the field

value.description: Value of the field at this point

windingWindowMagneticStrengthField.description: Data describing the magnetic strengtg field inside the winding window
windingWindowMagneticStrengthField.title: windingWindowMagneticStrengthFieldOutput

origin.description: Origin of the value of the result

methodUsed.description: Model used to calculate the magnetizing inductance in the case of simulation, or method used to measure it

frequency.description: Value of the field at this point
